name: hyperpipe
description: Hyperpipe is a privacy friendly YouTube front end that can be self hosted. It proxies video and audio streams, removes tracking and ads, and presents content in a clean interface for safer watching.
features: YouTube Proxy: Access YouTube content through a privacy-respecting proxy server.
Ad-Free Viewing: Watch videos without advertisements or sponsored content.
No Tracking: Browse and watch without Google tracking your viewing habits.
Audio Streaming: Stream music from YouTube with audio-only mode to save bandwidth.
Playlist Support: Create and manage playlists without a YouTube account.
Search Functionality: Search for videos and channels without leaving the interface.
Subscription Management: Subscribe to channels and get updates without Google account.
Self-Hosted Option: Run your own instance for complete privacy and control.
